thread.title: Hugh Grant and Girlfriend Reportedly Expecting
thread.title_full: Hugh Grant and Girlfriend Reportedly Expecting

title: Hugh Grant and Girlfriend Reportedly Expecting
text:
Hugh Grant and Girlfriend Reportedly Expecting Posted just a moment ago 
Universal (LOS ANGELES) -- Hugh Grant is set to become a new father. 
The Man from U.N.C.L.E. actor and his girlfriend, Swedish TV producer Anna Eberstein, are expecting their second child together, Entertainment Tonight reports. 
They currently have a three-year-old son, John Mungo Grant. 
The 55-year-old British actor is used to being a new dad by this point. He's welcomed two children with ex-girlfriend Tinglan Hong in recent years: daughter Tabitha, in 2011, and son Felix, in 2013.
